value.title: How cybersecurity is getting AI wrong
value.excerpt: Organizations are introducing AI models into security practices across their business, but they're not properly managing the risk.

value.title: Spain’s Most Valuable Euro 2020 Star Was French-Born Laporte, Suggests AI
value.excerpt: Now, after his chosen team exited at the semi-final stage of the competition, it seems he was Spain’s most valuable player. At least, that is according to Olocip, an artificial intelligence (AI) company founded by former Real Madrid playmaker Esteban Granero.

value.title: New stroke rehabilitation pattern based on brain-computer interface and robot technology
value.excerpt: Strokes, which occur when the blood supply to part of our brain is interrupted or reduced, are the leading cause of death and disability in the adult population.

value.title: AI brings promise and peril to customer relations management
value.excerpt: Keeping customers happy requires a lot of data, and CRM platforms are increasingly relying on AI to meet those expectations.

value.title: Is the US labor shortage the big break AI needs?
value.excerpt: Misconceptions about AI in the workplace have long been a barrier to widespread adoption — but companies experiencing labor shortages should consider where it can make their employees' lives better.

value.title: AI Weekly: TikTok’s algorithm licensing signals China’s play for AI dominance
value.excerpt: Join AI & data leaders at Transform 2021 on July 12th for the AI/ML Automation Technology Summit. Register today. This week, TikTok parent company ByteDance began licensing parts of its AI technologies to third parties through a new division called BytePlus.

value.title: AI is trying to prevent online shoppers from ditching their carts
value.excerpt: Conversion to a sale is the ultimate goal for online retailers. Trying to learn shoppers' intent helps sellers see better returns.

value.title: BASALT Minecraft competition aims to advance reinforcement learning

value.title: Optimize workforce in your store using Amazon Rekognition
value.excerpt: In this post, we show you how to use Amazon Rekognition and AWS DeepLens to detect, and analyze occupancy in a retail business to optimize workforce utilization. value.title: Claims That Highway Dollars Won’t Boost Economic Growth Are Missing Something Vital, Namely AI Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Some are contending that infrastructure investment into highway dollars will have a minimal payoff, but this is argued herein as a wholly myopic view that fails to include the advent of AI self-driving cars.
